bioAsHtml: I'm a long-standing expert in open source development, Scalatra and Apache PredictionIO (incubating) committer and the creator of GitBucket which is a open source Git server based on Scala and Java technologies. I've written some books and articles about Scala. The latest work is the Japanese translation of "Scala Puzzlers".
